Today I received a message on LinkedIn from one of my connections. Hereâ€™s a screencap of the message preview from my iPhone:

The screencap somehow got deleted, please enjoy this cat noping into a cardboard box instead ðŸ™ƒ

To summarize what the screencap was, my friend on LinkedIn sent a message congratulating and encouraging me on breaking into the tech scene as a self-taught developer.

We chatted briefly on LinkedIn, did a little Q&A and I left the door open for any future questions.

What This Means To Me

I was definitely happy to learn that another person became inspired through following my journey as a self-taught front-end developer. Maybe to someone else this might seem like a simple exchange of words, but to me itâ€™s what I live for â€” inspiring that is.

Okay, mini-rant over ðŸ˜…

At the end of the day, I wanted to write about my pleasant surprise. Thank you for encouraging me to keep at it. I hope you go forward in the direction your heart tells you to!

frontmatter.title: How to Be More Productive: 3 Simple Hacks
